name: No-MAZE-Out
description:
Welcome to No-MAZE-Out! In this game, your objective is to make your way through each labyrinth by collecting all the keys in each level under the time limit. Some levels may even have enemies for you to destroy instead in order to complete the level.

Each level also has hammer, shield, and blaster powerups to make your way through some of the obstacles such as cannons, spikes, bricks, and invisible walls in the labyrinth. Note that cannons, spikes, and invisible walls cannot be destroyed.

Use the up, down, right, and left arrow keys to move across the levels. Use the A and S keys to look around the level. And use the spacebar to use the hammer and blaster powerups.

Make it through all the levels in order to find the golden brick at the end as well as your way out of the labyrinth.
